question:
Consider the following:
  1. National Solar Mission
  2. National Mission on Sustainable Habitat
  3. National Water Mission
  4. National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
Which of the above form the core of National Action Plan for climate change?
explanation:
There are Eight National Missions which form the core of National Action Plan for climate change. They are:
  • National Solar Mission
  • National Mission for Enhanced Energy Efficiency
  • National Mission on Sustaining the Himalayan Ecosystem
  • National Mission for a Green India
  • National Water Mission
  • National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
  • National Mission for Strategic Knowledge for Climate Change
  • National Mission for Sustainable Habitat
